title: CyberArk Brute Force
spl_query: index=*cyberark* sourcetype=cyberark:epv:cef cef_name="Failure: User Authentication" | bin _time as bin_time span=5m  | sort 0 bin_time | rename bin_time as time | fillnull value="N/A" | stats count min(_time) as stime, max(_time) as etime, values(act) as action, values(cef_name) as cef_name, values(dest) as dest, values(app) as app by src, user, time  | where count > 5 | convert ctime(*time) | eval name="Brute Force Attack on CyberArk"

title: Auth Login2
discription: this use case is for admin loginadshf sdkjbf
spl_query: index=spl host=ppxc | stats count by host

title: Unresolved Malware
discription: This use case is for detecting Unresolved Malware
spl_query: | datamodel Malware search | rename Malware_Attacks.* AS * | search vendor_product!="McAfee McAfee System Prep Tool" signature!="Trusted - Local" | mvexpand file_path | lookup lilly_av_allowedFilePaths file_path OUTPUT meta | where isnull(meta) | transaction dest, file_hash, file_path, signature, file_name maxspan=1h | search action!=blocked | stats values(*) AS *, values(_time) AS stime by dest | eval stime=strftime(stime, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S") | eval incident_url=if(vendor_product="ms:defender:atp:alerts", url, incident_url)

title: Phishing activity
discription: this use case is for Phishing loginadshf sdkjbf
spl_query: index=spl host=ppxc | stats count by malware

title: Email
discription: this use case is for Phishing loginadshf sdkjbf
spl_query: index=spl host=ppxc | stats count by email

title: Monitor Skipped Searches
discription: This use case is for Monitor Skipped Searches
spl_query: index=_internal host=* sourcetype=scheduler (status="completed" OR status="skipped" OR status="deferred") | eval alert_actions = if(isnull(alert_actions) OR alert_actions == "", "none", alert_actions)  | stats count by status, host  | sort - count  | eventstats sum(count) AS total  | eval percent = round(count / total * 100, 2)." %"  | fields - total  | rename status as Status, app as App, user as User, savedsearch_name as "Report Name", alert_actions as "Alert Actions", count as Count, percent as Percent_of_Total  | search Status=skipped
